name: 彭祖乙
objective:
人工智慧物聯網課程將物聯網的感測器與感測網路、邊緣閘道、雲端服務與存取裝置，結合機器學習、深度學習及智慧分析技術，協同建構從端到端的智慧應用，涵蓋無人商店與智慧支付、遠距醫療與照護、智慧製造與智慧家庭等多元場景。本課程著重於人工智慧在裝置與服務設計中的關鍵角色，並透過實務案例與專題討論，培養學生規劃並開發創新智慧物聯網解決方案的能力。
The AIoT course integrates sensors and sensor networks, edge gateways, cloud services, and user access devices with machine learning, deep learning, and intelligent analytics to jointly build end-to-end smart applications. These applications cover a variety of domains such as Unmanned stores and smart payment, remote healthcare and telemedicine, smart manufacturing, and smart home systems. This course emphasizes the pivotal role of AI in device and service design, and through practical case studies and project discussions, aims to equip students with the ability to plan and develop innovative intelligent IoT solutions.
schedule:

week 2   AIoT technology introduction

week 7-8  AIoT Service development (1)
week 9  Mid-term report
week10-11    AIoT Service development (2)

week   17-18  Group project presentation
